languages.text: "Особая связь? С этим... человеком? За подобное я бы лично вспорола твое тонкое эльдарское горлышко".

traits.locale_text: "Особая связь? С этим... человеком? За подобное я бы лично вспорола твое тонкое эльдарское горлышко".

languages.text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."
languages.original_text: "Особая связь? С этим... человеком? За подобное я бы лично вспорола твое тонкое эльдарское горлышко".

traits.locale_text: "A special bond? With this... human? I would personally cut open your thin Aeldari throat for this."
"A special bond? With this... human? I would personally cut open your thin Aeldari throat for this."
"A special bond? With this... human being? I would personally cut open your thin Aeldari throat for this."
"A special bond? With this... human being? I would personally cut open your thin Aeldari throat for this."
"A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."
"A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

languages.text: « Une relation spéciale ? Avec cet... individu ? Je trancherai personnellement votre gorge d'Aeldari rachitique pour ça. »
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: « Une relation spéciale ? Avec un... être humain ? Je trancherai personnellement votre gorge d'Aeldari pour ça. »

languages.text: “特别的关系？和这个……人？你身为艾达灵族，居然堕落到这种程度，我真想亲自割开你那纤细的喉咙。”
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: “特别的关系？和这个……人类？你身为艾达灵族，居然堕落到这种程度，我真想亲自割开你那纤细的喉咙。”

languages.text: 「特別な絆？そこの…人物とか？私としては今回のことでその痩せこけたアエルダリの喉を切り裂いてやりたいのだが」
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: 「特別な絆？そこの…人間とか？私としては今回のことでその細いアエルダリの喉を切り裂いてやりたいのだが」

languages.text: "Eine besondere Verbindung? Mit dieser ... Person? Dafür würde ich Euch persönlich Eure dürre Aeldari-Kehle aufschlitzen."
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: "Eine besondere Verbindung? Mit diesem ... Menschen? Dafür würde ich Euch persönlich Eure dünne Aeldari-Kehle aufschlitzen."

languages.text: «¿Un vínculo especial? ¿Con esta... persona? Te rajaría yo misma esa garganta Aeldari raquítica por eso».
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un vínculo especial? ¿Con {mf|este... humano|esta... humana}? Te rajaría yo misma esa fina garganta de Aeldari por eso».

languages.text: "Özel bir bağ mı? Bu şahısla mı? O sıska Aeldari boğazını sırf bu sebeple kesebilirim."
languages.original_text: "A special bond? With this... person? I would personally cut open your scrawny Aeldari throat for that."

traits.locale_text: "Özel bir bağ mı? Bu şahısla mı? O sıska Aeldari boğazını sırf bu sebeple kesebilirim."
